0.1.5 notes:

Smoothed the camera

Changed appearance of bunny and bear

-------------------------------------------------------

Arrow keys move you around and the Enter/Return key starts the game.

Right now, the entire world is 20 "zones" for testing. There are 3 types of animals in the game:

Rabbit
Bear
Water Animal

You can transition between zones using the black hole found in each area or simply travel to the top of the map.

There is a day/night cycle.

I'm planning on adding more animals, balancing them and adding mechanics that allow the player to use the animals for a purpose.

Structures and monsters are next.

Verified to run on windows/mac
